attributes.action: re-name cardiff international airport to "Gavin and Stacey airport"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cardiff international airport is undergoing a renaming process

one of the favourite names at the moment is "Gavin and Stacey airport"

This name would be brilliant for the airport

Please sign this petition to rename the airport to this.

This petition should be passed on to the owners of the airport and if a number of citizens, in which they seem acceptable, sign this petition then they should use it as a major source in the re-naming process but the final decisin is entirely up to them.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
